functionDecorators.name: addToSetToken
functionDecorators.description: Add component to the SetToken, partially or total.

functionDecorators.name: initialize
functionDecorators.description: Initializes this module to the SetToken with issuance-related hooks. Only callable by the SetToken's manager. Hook addresses are optional. Address(0) means that no hook will be called.

parameterDecorators.name: _setToken
parameterDecorators.description: Instance of the SetToken to issue.

functionDecorators.name: removeFromSetToken
functionDecorators.description: Remove component from the SetToken, partially or total.

functionDecorators.name: removeModule
functionDecorators.description: Called by a SetToken to notify that this module was removed from the Set token. Any logic can be included in case checks need to be made or state needs to be cleared.
